I‚Äôm so disappointed‚Ä¶ Today first time I stop at the dirtiest LOVE‚Äôs Travel Stop I ever seen, and cashier was not friendly at all.

Nice place. You're able to stop and rest a bit if needed (just don't overstay). And there are shower rooms if you need to freshen up. ‚Ä¶

Small lot like most loves in the country clean shower what gave it a 1 Star is the McDonald's closed early and they charged me  full price for a hot meal that should of been discarded at 10:16 p.m other than that ok place

‚Ä¶ Was trying to shower and worker knocked on door and started putting code in before I could even say someone's in here. THEN 3 minutes later the worker knocked again and when I said someone is in here trying to shower...I was told to SHUT UP ‚Ä¶

Stop here for my 10hrs break 18/4/25 reserve my shower immediately no waiting time, went to shower #4 that was assigned to me as soon as I walk in my eyes immediately catch the toilet someone else *** was around the edges I try to flush it ‚Ä¶

We stopped at Love‚Äôs Travel Stop for a break in driving. It has a Subway and McDonald‚Äôs too. The women‚Äôs restrooms only had 4 stalls, which created a line into the hallway. It was clean inside.

Just stopped at this location to fill up my RV spent over $150 in gas went inside to get food, coffee and use the restroom and heard an announcement telling us to move it's a tow zone still at the pump.   Will not stop at this location again.  Avoid if you can.  Safe travels.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ nothing even if I run out of diesel. It seems unbelievable, but you will find out in a hard if you try to spend overnight in this place.  And to take a shower there is a minimum wait of three to four hours, if you lucky enough. Good luck!

The store looked bright, organized and pretty good, but the shower room was really gross. As a professional driver who relies on these facilities, i was not only disapppinted ,but i was disgusted to the point of writing this review to warn ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the deli area. But he wasn‚Äôt really paying attention to the customers. Overall experience wasn‚Äôt bad. Just stopped to get diesel and shower. Some of the shelves were a little empty. Some areas did need a little attention. Other than that, ‚Ä¶

Today was my first time here and I liked it;  Firstly, a large and bright room.. Clean everywhere... I especially liked the shower.. Clean.. But there is "BUT".. I COULD NOT PRINT THE DOCUMENTS - YOU DO NOT HAVE THE "EMAIL" OPTION.. Fix it ‚Ä¶
1 hour waiting for shower. showers are empty but no one is here to clean them

No shower at night.

Today is my 3 rd days the do reserved parking but not have space left. ThNk you.

But I park Get good take care. Very nice staff .

$25 for a shower?!? Much of the truck parking has been eliminated due to the road construction on the highway. All of the spots are now blind-side and trucks are parked along the curb in front of those spots. Bobtails everywhere! Make-a- ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm usually never give a bad review on google but this one got me really good first I make a reservation for the shower. It took me forever to waiting from the noon around 12 o‚Äôclock. I was waiting until 4 PM so I decided to do a laundry ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs no reason they should be charging $25 for a shower when it‚Äôs 17-19$ at any other flying J or Pilot really don‚Äôt think corp kno about this and for the water not to be hot AVIOD THIS TRUCK STOP AT ALL COST CAUSE ITS GONNA COST YOUüò° ‚Ä¶

The shower is dirty the staff is rude this place is not for truck drivers try to avoid this place disgusting people

Thanks for the experience

showerReviews.reviewText: Close to where I work out of.  The printers for receipts works only part of the time.  The maintenance here has gone downhill over the last year.  If I know I'm passing a truck stop on my route then I skip this place.  Used to be kept clean and neat.  Now run down

Had the cheapest fuel in the area, pumps was very dirty and screen and keyboard was showing it's age, will fuel here again in future,  may been close to cleaning day due to this being a unmanned location.

I fuel here every other day M-F. At times it is OK. But there is no consistency to its upkeep. The men's room is usable but needs a serious cleaning.
The air hoses for tire pressure maintenance have been disconnand now are ‚Ä¶

24 hour fuel no attendant, no store. Bathrooms (shown in picture) are pay to use, I don't think there is a shower in there I've never used the bathroom. Credit card only with $75 max limit. 5 spaces to park, locals have 3 taken.
Clean facility with great deisel fuel prices!Limited truck parking , and several food establishments very close by. Thank you for the great fuel price!!

showerReviews.reviewText: We are handicapped truck drivers. Other than having parking spots, there was no accessibility for disabled drivers. Showers and lounge are upstairs without an elevator. Once upstairs, there isn't a handicapped shower at all. How on earth ‚Ä¶
Hey this is a cool place!Have washers & driers  upstairs! A room with big flat screen while you wait.A restaurant on the side a gas station.You can rent a shower if you need to take one.

Door at the top of the stairs is really odd and kind of dangerous imo. Husband and I use same shower. Halfway through his shower the light turned off and that‚Äôs really dangerous. If someone were in there by themselves they‚Äôd slip and fall ‚Ä¶

My boyfriend went into his shower, shaving cream etc was still in the shower but had fresh towels so clearly they didn't clean the shower otherwise they would have removed those items from the previous person. üòë  then it was 110¬∞ upstairs ‚Ä¶

Went in to get a shower to be informed all of there showers were down. Really, at $16 a shower you guys should put a little more time in maintaining your showers. If I could give you Zero stars I would.

Amazing place for a nice hot shower and wonderful restaurant. Best of all is the Diesel TSA named Dennis. Wonderful representative as well as warm hearted. Very helpful and will go above and beyond, Dennis is the best.

‚Ä¶ Why haven't anybody sued ta yet for not having handicapped showers. They small edgy and dangerous if you hit a knee or limb. To make matters worse. On a hot day the shower cleaner turns on the hot light timer. It was like a sauna. Couldn't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ up. Didn't even lose my parking spot. I was hesitant to eat at Country Pride but the food was actually good at this location. The waitress appeared to be the only one working but she was on point. The shower was clean and water was hot.

Worst service ever they had 4 showers dirty and no employee around to clean them. went down an finally talk to the cashier her excuse was they where getting ready in the supplies room to clean them, probably getting stoned and doing drugs ‚Ä¶
Dirtiest TA I have ever seen, even we can‚Äôt get shower via APP , after I purchased shower they said all shower dirty cleaners on their break i was on rush with my load can‚Äôt wait

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the last few years, even in the past it never caught my attention and the truth is I don't know why. I've only used it for the shower. The showers are large and clean and I never I have to wait one minute to get me into a shower. And ‚Ä¶
Not a bad place. And they have security that walks the property. None of my fuel cards work here and needed a shower. So I was going to pay cash.  But $25 for a shower is crazy! ‚Ä¶
Shower are hot but they are rundown need to remodel the shower room but the staff was nice and the meatloaf was delicious but like no parking for cars

Use to be a great place to go pay for and take shower. Not so much any more. Now it's hit or miss most of the time they aren't even letting showers be used. The employees are not friendly, they are not wanting to work but stand around and ‚Ä¶

25 dollar shower is messed up, but im giving a good review because Trish helped me out with a deal in the app that wasn't going through even though it met the criteria. Very good employee that redeemed my experience after costly shower ‚Ä¶

Bethany was awesome I called ahead if time and asked her if I was able to bring my puppy and she said "yes"... Not only is it $5 to shower, but I tipped her $5 as well. Clean place to go if you want to take a shower.

The only bad experience I have had which is really not all that bad is I had to wait on a shower for 30 to 45 mins at like 3 in the morning when I came. You would think that would be a no wait time at that time of a üåÑ. But in their defense ‚Ä¶
Went inside to get a shower was looking at some merchandise and security approached my wife and told her to empty her pockets and patted her down accused her of stealing.
I love this truck stop no wait on a shower always hot water it only $5 now parking is limited. But they let you park at the last fuel islands. Favorite in Indy food is great .
Not very often I go in to shower feeling dirty and come out feeling dirtier!! All my pics are from shower 1 which cost 25.00 may I add!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ clean towel upon request. Customer service is above average for the type of place. The main part is clean, but there is black mold in the top half of the shower. Also, someone doesn't do a full clean, and there was even a surprise floating, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ And I was blown away! Beautiful HUGE private bathroom/shower done in lovely ceramic tile. With huge well lit vanity and built-in shower seat. Large fluffy bath towels bath mat and washcloth. They happily supply hou with extra linens on ‚Ä¶
Cold shower room. ‚Ä¶
My shower power.fuel and scale all went smooth n lastly they have types of food products good for me a longhauller. I usually stop here. Its comfortable for me ,  here i feel well treatrd.
if I could I would give them 0 stars, very dirty, got bugs in the shower, dirty towels, this pilot is very nasty. Most pilots keep there place clean. Plz plz be aware truckers.
Plumbing issues at our house so we went there for a shower.  Very nice and friendly!  Little pricey for a shower but the water was warm and it was clean!
The showers one horrible!!The bathrooms was not clean. I came in around midnight to shower and the lady did not care that she had people in line.They should close down and rebuild.
Small place but was able to get a shower right away and was nice and clean.
Not a lot of parking space but shower was very clean.
Needs to be limit on shower time. Waiting 3-4 hrs to shower is outrageous.
